seller_description: he KYY 15.6-Inch FHD 1080P Portable Monitor is designed to deliver exceptional performance with its advanced IPS screen offering a 1920x1080 resolution, HDR technology, and a 178° wide viewing angle. Ideal for gaming and multimedia, this monitor ensures smooth visuals, vibrant color rendering, and eye-care features such as reduced blue light radiation and flicker-free viewing, making it comfortable for extended use. Equipped with 2 USB Type-C ports and a Mini-HDMI port, this portable monitor provides wide compatibility with laptops, smartphones, PCs, PS4, XBOX, Nintendo Switch, and other devices supporting Thunderbolt 3 or USB-C 3.1. With a slim 0.3-inch profile and lightweight design of just 1.7 lbs, it easily fits into your bag for on-the-go productivity or entertainment. The included scratch-proof PU leather smart cover doubles as a stand with adjustable viewing angles, ensuring durability and convenience. The monitor features built-in stereo speakers and a 3.5mm audio jack, enhancing the audio experience, while its premium gray metal finish adds a sleek touch. Supporting both landscape and portrait modes, the KYY monitor is perfect for gaming, dual-monitor setups, or phone screen extensions, all backed by a friendly menu control wheel and 24/7 professional support.
review: I got this to use with my Steam Deck. I had all the other parts needed, to seamlessly connect the monitor, keyboard, mouse and power to the Steam Deck.I am selling a laptop and my girlfriend still wanted to play 7 Days To Die with me.Refresh rate is perfect, Audio is a little 'tinny' but fine, everything works right out of the box.Cables seem to be of good quality. You get a charging cable, a double usb-c cable and an hdmi to mini-hdmi cable.Innovative stand, taking notes from tablets, works well. I was worried it wouldn't be sturdy enough to be bumped, but it's fine and seems durable.Good color gamut for gaming. Easy on the eyes and didn't experience eye strain.
Expected_output: The seller's description of the KYY 15.6-Inch FHD 1080P Portable Monitor highlights its advanced IPS screen with 1920x1080 resolution, HDR technology, and a 178° wide viewing angle, promoting its suitability for gaming and multimedia. It emphasizes features like eye-care technology, dual USB Type-C and Mini-HDMI compatibility, ultra-slim design, lightweight portability, built-in stereo speakers, and a durable PU leather smart cover. The buyer's review confirms many of these claims, praising the monitor's easy setup, good color gamut, durable stand, included high-quality cables, and seamless connectivity with devices like the Steam Deck. The buyer also appreciates the lack of eye strain and the sturdy, innovative stand design. The seller's images align with the buyer's, as both showcase the monitor's sleek appearance and functional design. However, the buyer notes slightly tinny audio, which is a minor shortcoming not mentioned in the description but doesn't detract significantly from overall satisfaction. Based on the review and images, the buyer appears satisfied, aligning with the seller's promises, and there are no significant discrepancies to attribute fault to either party.
label: 1:Here buyer satisfied with seller
